feed.title: GitHub GDScript Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of GDScript in GitHub

entry.title: Zylann/godot_heightmap_plugin
entry.summary: HeightMap terrain for Godot implemented in GDScript

entry.title: db0/godot-card-game-framework
entry.summary: A framework which comes with prepared scenes and classes to kickstart your card game, as well as a powerful scripting engine to use to provide full rules enforcement.

entry.title: HungryProton/scatter
entry.summary: Godot engine addon to randomly fill an area with props or other scenes
